title: Native Union launches Snap 3-in-1 Magnetic Wireless Charger for iPhone, AirPods, Apple Watch
content:
Following up on the Snap 2-in-1, Native Union is out today with its latest MagSafe compatible wireless charging dock. The offers dedicated spots for iPhone 12 or 13, Apple Watch, and AirPods along with neat touches like a removable USB-C Apple Watch charger that can be used on its own.

moreâ€¦

The post Native Union launches Snap 3-in-1 Magnetic Wireless Charger for iPhone, AirPods, Apple Watch appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The larger sibling to the Snap 2-in-1, the new Native Union Snap 3-in-1 Magnetic Wireless Charger powers up iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods.
